dcterms:description: XL-SUM is a large-scale multilingual dataset for abstractive summarization, covering 44 languages and consisting of 306,522 training samples and 11,535 test samples.
dcterms:title: XL-SUM

dcterms:description: The ACL Anthology is a comprehensive collection of papers published in the field of computational linguistics and natural language processing since 1965.
dcterms:title: ACL Anthology

dcterms:creator: Angela Fan

dcterms:description: WritingPrompts is a dataset consisting of human-written stories paired with writing prompts from Reddit's WritingPrompts forum, designed for story generation tasks.
dcterms:title: WritingPrompts
